channel.title: Learning game programming
channel.description: Are there any good tutorials out there that could teach me how to load, animate, and move sprites properly, and just game program in general? I have found tutorials on this before, but they always left me with questions because they were not explained properly, anyone know any good ones? Or possibly a book I could get?

item.title: Learning game programming
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:2, topic:444205”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=546894.msg4009297#msg4009297 date=1339001441]
Are there any good tutorials out there that could teach me how to load, animate, and move sprites properly, and just game program in general? I have found tutorials on this before, but they always left me with questions because they were not explained properly, anyone know any good ones? Or possibly a book I could get?
[/quote]
Go back to one of those that left you with questions, and ask someone those questions

Honestly, the best way to learn is by asking, modifying, & testing endlessly[/quote]

That is what I’ve done ever since I wanted my own rsps. You should check out TheNewBoston on youtube for his Java Game Development tutorials, and definitely check this out http://www.jguru.com/article/client-side/java-game-development-tutorial.html, I thought it was easy to understand.
